holidays.title: Vesak
holidays.description: Vesak celebrates Buddha’s birth, along with his enlightenment and death in some traditions.

holidays.title: Buddha Purnima
holidays.description: Take deep breaths and clear your mind, as we take you on a mystical journey!

holidays.title: Chardonnay Day
holidays.description: Celebrating Chardonnay, crafted from the beautiful vineyards of Pinot noir and Gouais blanc.

holidays.title: Day of Vesak
holidays.description: It is the Day of Vesak, the day to honor Buddha's birth, enlightenment, and death.

holidays.title: International Day to End Obstetric Fistula
holidays.description: On this International Day to End Obstetric Fistula, we’re providing support and spreading awareness.

holidays.title: Lucky Penny Day
holidays.description: See a penny, pick it up, all day long you’ll have good luck!

holidays.title: Medical Coder Day
holidays.description: Let’s get together to show appreciation for all American medical coders this National Medical Coder Day.

holidays.title: National Drinking with Chickens Day
holidays.description: This National Drinking with Chickens Day, let’s celebrate with a cocktail or two!

holidays.title: National Ethan Day
holidays.description: Here’s how you can celebrate National Ethan Day in honor of all the Ethans out there.

holidays.title: National Reed Day
holidays.description: Check out three fun and unique ways to celebrate National Reed Day.

holidays.title: World Crohn's and Colitis Day
holidays.description: Let's raise awareness about two chronic gastrointestinal diseases that have no cure.

holidays.title: World Turtle Day
holidays.description: This day honors two animals associated with wisdom and perseverance — turtles and tortoises.

holidays.title: Drew Carey’s Birthday
holidays.description: We love to see success in every aspect of the hats this talented entertainer wears.

holidays.title: Jackson Duggar’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can’t wait to see the upward trajectory of this reality star’s career as an entertainer.

holidays.title: James Charles’s Birthday
holidays.description: Just like a phoenix, this talented makeup artist continues to rise from the ashes every time.

holidays.title: Jason Nash’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor and comedian is one joke away from colossal world domination.
